Posts.Content: It’s a good feeling isn’t it !! I got a letter today from the breast unit for an appointment December 2019 ! That’s a year away x  still got chemo ( belts and braces ) in jan x  Merry Christmas
Posts.Title: ***December 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Chat ***

Posts.Content: I had docetaxel and heceptin and prejeta chemo combo before my mastectomy-  I was ok on it x just a bit constipated on about day 4 x but managed with tablets- I am having FEC after Xmas even though my cancer is now gone as had mastectomy and nothing in my lymph nodes x I am a bit nervous of FEC as don’t know what to expect x but I am only having 3 cycles -
Posts.Title: ***December 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Chat ***

Posts.Content: Excellent good news - I have been thinking of you all day xxx congratulations xx
Posts.Title: ***December 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Chat ***

Posts.Content: hi - just had a tag fitted for my breast tumour and the radiologist found another lump in my same breast today - only 6 mm . So that has been biopsied . Has this happened to any one else - I am now very distressed .
Posts.Title: 2 nd lump found

Posts.Content: When it was looked at on ultrasound on 3 July they said axilla all looked fine but today she said 1 lymph node looks slightly bigger but it could be it reacting to core biopsy? She did a biopsy on lymph node too x  rhank you Tilly xxxx
Posts.Title: 2 nd lump found

Posts.Content: Thank you Tilly x x x
Posts.Title: 2 nd lump found

Posts.Content: I just feel more worried hearing I have 2 lumps now xx I can’t stop crying with worry - up to now I have been really chirpy and positive- I am just scared now x I don’t know what to do with myself , does a second lump make it all worse - I just don’t know - I feel like screaming at the moment x
Posts.Title: 2 nd lump found

Posts.Content: Ah that’s encouraging Sleeplesss21 hopefully it won’t change the treatment plan - I feel more positive today which is good xx  thank you xx
Posts.Title: 2 nd lump found

Posts.Content: Just got call from hospital- because of 2nd tumour found yesterday- they want to give me breast MRI x so chemo on hold until results from yesterday are in ( next Tuesday they will know ) x  they said breast MRI is not uncommon-  xx
Posts.Title: 2 nd lump found

Posts.Content: It’s jist frightened me So much , has it made things worse etc x x I don’t know what to do with myself x I just want to have a mastectomy to just get rid of it all x
Posts.Title: 2 nd lump found

Posts.Content: It’s jist frightened me So much , has it made things worse etc x x I don’t know what to do with myself x I just want to have a mastectomy to just get rid of it all x
Posts.Title: 2 nd lump found

Posts.Content: Thank you Leolady56 you are so kind xxx
Posts.Title: 2 nd lump found

Posts.Content: Hi everyone- I am waiting for start date for FEC -   I have already had docetaxel prejeta and heceptin combo before surgery- is FEC tougher, etc.   Hugs to all x
Posts.Title: FEC

Posts.Content: Thank you xx taking senokot tonight xx  it’s so lovely to get help on this site xx
Posts.Title: Slight constipation

Posts.Content: Hi Shiny - thank you for your reply - Yes I am getting there xx just the chemo 3 cycles that’s all then 13 heceptin injections 1 every 3 weeks ) then tamoxifen xx  hugs to you x
Posts.Title: FEC

Posts.Content: Hi the last couple of mornings when I go to the loo ( sorry if you are eating lunch/tea ) I have been a bit constipated- I have passed stool , in the end ! But not my usual easy movement- hence my bottom is sore - so have sudocrem for that - can I take senokot on chemo - or ANY other remedies maybe food etc xx any advice would be great - I am drinking lots of fluid - going to eat plums today , xx hugs xx to everyone
Posts.Title: Slight constipation

Posts.Content: Yes - I think I might have to do that - I took 1 senokot on Friday before bed and had 2 loose bowel movements on Saturday and two loose ones today - it does seem strong - which one do you have - just incase I need them after next chemo again xx hugs xx
Posts.Title: Slight constipation

Posts.Content: I have been doing zarzio injections since Tuesday night - 2 more jabs to do - tonight and then tomorrow night x this morning I have really bad lower back pain - has anyone else had this with these injections?
Posts.Title: Zarzio injections

Posts.Content: Thank you earwig o - pain is easing a bit now - i had felt fine after chemo - on day 7 at the moment and this is the first SE I have had so far - x the nurse told me it can often give back lower back pain because it’s near where the biggest bones are ( pelvic) x my temperature is hovering around 37.1 today and I was a bit scared of taking pain relief as I didn’t know if my temperature was heading up and it would mask it - as it mustn’t go over 37.5 so I used a hot water bottle instead today - thank you for your advice xx
Posts.Title: Zarzio injections

Posts.Content: Well next Friday ( 12 October) I will be 50 xx can’t believe it !! Now I don’t really drink alcohol ( have had none since May ) BUT should the occasion arise am I allowed a glass of fizz or a shandy  to celebrate- I am on docetaxel prejeta and  heceptin x  hugs to all xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Big birthday

Posts.Content: Hi - has anyone else had a nosebleed on chemo or zarzio - I just had one - it did stop after about 3 mins - but a bit scary and unexpected ! Paranoid incase it happens again so tissue in hand at the ready x x
Posts.Title: Nose bleed

Posts.Content: Thank you for your reply- yes it was weird - but I have spent all day thinking it might happen again ( it hasn’t) I did ring up the onco team and they said if it happens again to give them a call again x x it was only one nostril though xx
Posts.Title: Nose bleed
